message:
SYSTEM: Enabling_ontology-based_Streaming_Data_Access2.pdf: Página 17
Stored Data Query Translation
17
Enabling  Ontology-based Access to Streaming Data Sources
SELECT
concat( ‘ssg4env.eu#ObservationWind' ,  
envdata_milford.datetime ) as  x, 
FROM
envdata_milford [ FROM NOW - 1 TO NOW MIN]
SELECT
concat( ‘ssg4env.eu#ObservationWind' ,  
envdata_milford.datetime ) as  x, 
envdata_milford.Hs as y
FROM
envdata_milford [ FROM NOW - 1 TO NOW MIN]
SELECT ?y
FROM STREAM < STREAM 
<http://www.semsorgrid4env.eu/ccometeo.srdf> 
[ NOW – 1 MINUTE TO NOW – 0 MINUTES ] >
WHERE
{ ?x a cd:Observation; 
cd:observationResult ?y. }
Translation
Redundant queries, unacceptable for stream 
processing
speaker: SYSTEM
